title: Over in the meadow
creator_credit: Weston Woods Studios, Morton Schindel and Cynthia Freitag
brief_description: For generations children have sung and loved this gay, counting song in which flowers, animals and birds, mothers and babies have provided the delightful setting for a lesson in numbers and nature. In this version lively vignettes in stunning colours make ideal company for the rhythmic pattern of the text.
